info.name: Teste API - Operadoras
info.description: ## ðŸ”– Como usar este **template** #### **Passo 1: Envio requests** Para buscar uma operadora pelo seu CNPJ: Exemplo: GET [http://localhost:5000/api/operadoras/22891640000171](http://localhost:5000/api/operadoras/22891640000171) #### **Passo 2: Responses** Observa a resposta por status code (200 OK). Exemplo da resposta do servidor com os dados mais relevantes.

request.description:
This is a GET request and it is used to "get" data from an endpoint. There is no request body for a GET request, but you can use query parameters to help specify the resource you want data on (e.g., in this request, we have `id=1`).

A successful GET response will have a `200 OK` status, and should include some kind of response body - for example, HTML web content or JSON data.
